Contact us

Skills Masters.

Skills Masters is the global home of excellence for design-led thinking. We are a team of passionate and dedicated individuals from various fields brought together with a shared vision of equipping young people with prerequisite skills to prepare them for a digital future.
Our mission is to empower our learners with skills through interactive learning and encourage them to develop critical thinking and problem skills at a very early age. We aim to empower learners from all walks of life with skills that enable them to be global citizens in the digital world. Our curriculum is carefully desined to impart critical thinking and problem solving skills to our learners creating solutions in a dynamic environment. Our mission is to promote this mindset shift by making design-led thinking accessible to everyone, and a standard practice. .

Skills Masters
Our Programs

At Skills Masters we have designed our programs to cater for different needs of esteemed clients. The programs are divided into three categories to meet various requirements of the society.

Year Long Programs:
This program is tailored to offer coding classes throughout the year. The lessons are conducted virtually allowing learners the flexible opportunity to learn from home and still enjoy top notch skill based training. The program gives you full support and unlocks tremendous potential in the learner.

Bootcamps

Unlock your coding potential with our intensive short term program that targets those on short off sessions. The trainings are planned periodically during school holidays and learners are taken through thorough training for a eriod of between two weeks to five weeks.

Partnerships

We are partnering with various schools to initiate coding clubs and equip the learners with necessary skills that will make them ready for a technology filled future. Currently we are in five schools with Nairobi city county.

Tech support and Proffessional trainings

We provide various technology solutions and consultancy services to support access to technology literacy especially to those from slums and other less privileged backgrounds.
We also offer training services to trainers and teachers on intergration of ICT in learning process.

Units Covered:

Learn with us and get covered in skill based training

Here are areas we cover:

  • Introduction to Computer Architecture
  • Introduction to Web development
  • Game development
  • Web based app development
  • Mobile based app development
  • Cyber Security

LEARN. MASTER. GROW.

The Team

We have a dedicated team of instructors with a vast experience in various fields; we believe our diverse backgrounds can harness our differences to tailor make a curriculum that can prepare our learners for a tech future. Our instruction team;

  • Collaborates closely with our team of consultants to plan for effective learning process that meets global standards
  • Monitors and assess learners' abilities, understanding of and proficiency in coding skills and modifying lessons that ensures all learners foster enjoy a dynamic, empowering and supportive learning environment
  • Guide and support learners in their final projects
  • Develop, maintain camp operations and upholding camp standards

POTENTIAL STUDENT:

Discover Your Abilities With Us

At Skills Masters we run a flagship program that provides a unique opportunity for young persons (ages 6-18) globally, to introduce them to key computer science concepts and skills. We provide flexible coding classes that allow learners to attend classes. We unlock and explore the limitless potential of our learners in coding.

We create interactive virtual classes and year-round for students to learn how to code, create & present projects, and be motivated to grow along their innovative path.

Meet with a member of our team who will discuss your goals and show you exactly our tailor made solutions work. Get the best for your child from the comfort of your home.

Model & Founder, KODE with Klossy Scholarships.
